channel.title: Need help with d claw spec
channel.description: I have Dragon Claws correctly added in my 317 server, there ID is 8002. However it's spec only shows/hits 2 hitsplats during the spec, instead of 4. Can anyone help me out? oh yeah and also, does anyone have a link to the "How to make Custom items" tut? i can't find it on search bar, and not sure where to look.

I have Dragon Claws correctly added in my 317 server, there ID is 8002. However it’s spec only shows/hits 2 hitsplats during the spec, instead of 4. Can anyone help me out? oh yeah and also, does anyone have a link to the “How to make Custom items” tut? i can’t find it on search bar, and not sure where to look.

Check in the Tutorial section for both adding a custom and making a perfect D claws spec… I swear I’ve used the tutorials on this site… It IS there…
